resources.string: To add an alarm, select the plus sign from the menu bar on the main screen. This will bring you to a page where you can select the time, days, challenges, and whether it is a location based alarm
To delete an alarm, select the alarm from the main page. This will bring you to the edit alarm page. There is a delete button on the bottom left

There are three possible puzzles: a memory puzzle, math puzzle, and tilt puzzle. The memory puzzle works by clicking on squares and matching images, until all images are matched. The math puzzle is solved by putting in answers on the line next to the equation. Answers may be negative. The tilt puzzle is solved when the fox passes over all the mice. The fox moves left or right when the screen is tilted.

When selecting location while editing or creating an alarm, the app will use your current location to set up a 100 meter radius. The alarm will only sound if you are in this radius. Every time you unselect and reselect the location option, it will use the current location for the radius.
